citation: State Policies and Projects Amendment Act 2023 (Tas)
text:
State Policies and Projects Amendment Act 2023

An Act to amend the State Policies and Projects Act 1993
[Royal Assent 31 August 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the State Policies and Projects Amendment Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

3. Principal Act
    In this Act, the State Policies and Projects Act 1993 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the State Policies and Projects Act 1993 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the State Policies and Projects Act 1993 .

6. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which it commenced.
